## R Markdown

---
title: "An Interactive Map"
---

Below is a map that shows the location of the
Department of Statistics, Iowa State University.

```{r out.width='100%', echo=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
library(dplyr)
# leaflet() %>% addTiles() %>%
#   setView(-93.65, 42.0285, zoom = 17) %>%
#   addPopups(
#     -93.65, 42.0285,
#     'Here is the <b>Department of Statistics</b>, ISU'
#   )
asset %>% transmute(lat =coalesce( potential_site_cordinates_latitude,potential_site_cordinates_001_latitude,Potential_gps_latitude),
                    lon = coalesce(potential_site_cordinates_longitude,potential_site_cordinates_001_longitude,Potential_gps_longitude)) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(lon)) %>% 
  leaflet() %>% addTiles() %>% 
  addMarkers(~lon,~lat)
```
